title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
rea, the Gur Tribe, a group of monster hunters, will accost you. If you let Astarion finish the ritual, they will believe he is a monster and attack. If not, they will let you leave peacefully, and joins you as allies in quest Gather Your Allies.

Depending on your next actions, you will receive one of the following outcomes after locating Cazador. Your interactions will vary depending on whether or not Astarion is with you. When Astarion faces him and attempts to interrupt the ritual he started
